title: Toy Sled
summaries: The Toy Sled is a pet summoning item that summons a baby snowman pet when used. It has a 5*1/20 (5%) chance of being dropped by Ice Mimics found in the Snow Biome. When far enough away, the Baby Snowman will ride a toy sled to catch up to the player.

statistics.Sell: 2 GC50 SC
